SEARCH
Package com.hotelapplication.backend

Class Room

java.lang.Object
com.hotelapplication.backend.Room
public class Room extends Object
The Room class represents a hotel room with attributes such as room ID, room number, bed type, description, price per night, and reservations. It provides methods to manage room information and reservations.
Author:
Alexander Boutselis

      public Room(int roomID, int roomNumber, int numOfBeds, String bedType, double pricePerNight, String roomDescription)
      Constructs a new Room object with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      roomID - The ID of the room.
      roomNumber - The number of the room.
      numOfBeds - The number of beds in the room.
      bedType - The type of bed in the room.
      pricePerNight - The price per night of the room.
      roomDescription - The description of the room.
